components.name: Twitter 1% firehose Source
components.description: Experimental source that connects via Streaming API to the 1% sample twitter firehose, continously downloads tweets, converts them to Avro format and sends Avro events to a downstream Flume sink. Requires the consumer and access tokens and secrets of a Twitter developer account.

maxBatchSize.name: Max batch size
maxBatchSize.description: Maximum number of twitter messages to put in a single batch

maxBatchDurationMillis.name: Max batch duration milliseconds
maxBatchDurationMillis.description: Maximum number of milliseconds to wait before closing a batch
